testsuite.name: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I change the Math App engine selection to "MapleNet (Math App)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Interactive Plot for Mathapp Grading"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I choose "Math App" link from the dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I choose a worksheet "QuadrantGame" from the acceptance resources for the Math App question
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I see the "Math App" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I assert that the Math App question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Interactive_Plot"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I select the question "Interactive Plot for Mathapp Grading"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Interactive Plot for Mathapp Grading"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Interactive_Plot" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I launch the "Interactive_Plot" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Math App question is rendered properly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: When I click the plot of "Interactive Plot for Mathapp Grading"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: And I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: Then my score 1 out of 1 (100 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Grade 100% assignment with one MathApp Question
